SDKs & Integration

Developer tools und code examples fr alle Plattformen

JavaScript SDK

Vanilla JavaScript & TypeScript

v2.1.5
Stable
Bundle Size: 45KB
Downloads: 125K/month
Installation 
npm install @voicepartnerai/sdk
# or
yarn add @voicepartnerai/sdk
Quick Start 
import VoicePartnerAI from '@voicepartnerai/sdk';

const vapi = new VoicePartnerAI({
  apiKey: 'your-api-key',
  serverUrl: 'https://api.voicepartnerai.eu'
});

// Start a voice call
const call = await vapi.start({
  assistant: 'assistant-id',
  customer: { number: '+49301234567' }
});

React SDK

Hooks & Components

v1.8.2
Stable
Bundle Size: 28KB
Downloads: 89K/month
Installation 
npm install @voicepartnerai/react-sdk
Usage Example 
import { useVoicePartnerAI } from '@voicepartnerai/react-sdk';

function App() {
  const { start, stop, isConnected } = useVoicePartnerAI({
    apiKey: 'your-api-key',
    assistantId: 'assistant-id'
  });

  return (
    

      
      
      
Status: {isConnected ? 'Connected' : 'Disconnected'}

    

  );
}

Composables & Components

v1.4.1
Beta

Downloads: 34K/month

npm install @voicepartnerai/vue-sdk
Composition API

Node.js SDK

TypeScript & JavaScript

v3.2.1
Stable
Server Integration 
const VoicePartnerAI = require('@voicepartnerai/node-sdk');

const vapi = new VoicePartnerAI({
  apiKey: process.env.VAPI_API_KEY,
  serverUrl: 'https://api.voicepartnerai.eu'
});

// Create assistant
const assistant = await vapi.assistants.create({
  name: 'Customer Support DE',
  model: 'gpt-5',
  voice: 'elevenlabs-german',
  prompt: 'Du bist ein hilfsbereiter Kundenservice-Agent...'
});

Python SDK

Async/Sync Support

v2.5.3
Stable
Python Integration 
import voicepartnerai

client = voicepartnerai.Client(
    api_key="your-api-key",
    server_url="https://api.voicepartnerai.eu"
)

# Create assistant
assistant = client.assistants.create(
    name="Customer Support DE",
    model="gpt-5",
    voice="elevenlabs-german",
    prompt="Du bist ein hilfsbereiter Kundenservice-Agent..."
)

# Start call
call = client.calls.create(
    assistant_id=assistant.id,
    customer_number="+49301234567"
)

iOS SDK

Swift & Objective-C

v1.3.0
Stable
Swift Integration 
import VoicePartnerAI

class CallManager {
    let vapi = VoicePartnerAI(
        apiKey: "your-api-key",
        serverUrl: "https://api.voicepartnerai.eu"
    )
    
    func startCall() {
        vapi.start(
            assistantId: "assistant-id",
            customerNumber: "+49301234567"
        ) { result in
            switch result {
            case .success(let call):
                print("Call started: \(call.id)")
            case .failure(let error):
                print("Error: \(error)")
            }
        }
    }
}

Android SDK

Kotlin & Java

v1.2.8
Stable
Kotlin Integration 
import eu.voicepartnerai.sdk.VoicePartnerAI

class CallManager {
    private val vapi = VoicePartnerAI(
        apiKey = "your-api-key",
        serverUrl = "https://api.voicepartnerai.eu"
    )
    
    suspend fun startCall() {
        try {
            val call = vapi.calls.create(
                assistantId = "assistant-id",
                customerNumber = "+49301234567"
            )
            Log.d("VoicePartnerAI", "Call started: ${call.id}")
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            Log.e("VoicePartnerAI", "Error starting call", e)
        }
    }
}

Flutter SDK

Cross-platform Dart

v0.8.4
Alpha
Flutter Integration 
import 'package:voicepartnerai_flutter/voicepartnerai_flutter.dart';

class CallScreen extends StatefulWidget {
  @override
  _CallScreenState createState() => _CallScreenState();
}

class _CallScreenState extends State {
  late VoicePartnerAI vapi;
  
  @override
  void initState() {
    super.initState();
    vapi = VoicePartnerAI(
      apiKey: 'your-api-key',
      serverUrl: 'https://api.voicepartnerai.eu',
    );
  }
  
  Future startCall() async {
    final call = await vapi.calls.create(
      assistantId: 'assistant-id',
      customerNumber: '+49301234567',
    );
    print('Call started: ${call.id}');
  }
}

Basic Usage Examples

Simple Outbound Call

// JavaScript
const call = await vapi.calls.create({
  assistant: 'customer-support-de',
  customer: {
    number: '+49301234567',
    name: 'Max Mustermann'
  },
  metadata: {
    campaign: 'support-callback'
  }
});

Inbound Call Handling

// Webhook endpoint
app.post('/webhook/inbound', (req, res) => {
  const { call, customer } = req.body;
  
  // Route to appropriate assistant
  const assistantId = routeCall(customer.number);
  
  res.json({
    assistantId,
    message: 'Hallo! Wie kann ich Ihnen helfen?'
  });
});

Recent Incidents

Resolved
2 hours ago
Webhook Delivery Delays
Some webhook deliveries experienced delays due to high traffic volume. Issue resolved by scaling webhook processors.
Duration: 23 minutes
Resolved
1 day ago
OpenAI API Rate Limiting
Temporary rate limiting from OpenAI API affecting assistant responses. Implemented automatic retry logic and fallback to Anthropic.
Duration: 1 hour 15 minutes

Sicherheitsrichtlinien

API Keys sind verschlsselt gespeichert
Rate Limiting zum Schutz vor Missbrauch
Automatische Key-Rotation verfgbar
DSGVO-konforme Logfhrung

Best Practices

Verwenden Sie separate Keys fr Dev/Prod
Regenerieren Sie Keys regelmig
Limitieren Sie Scopes nach Bedarf
Monitoring und Alerting aktivieren

API Reference

Interaktive API Dokumentation fr VoicePartnerAI

Assistants API

Verwalte und konfiguriere Voice AI Assistants

POST
/v1/assistants
Create new assistant

Request Body

JSON Schema 
{
  "name": "string (required)",
  "description": "string",
  "systemPrompt": "string (required)",
  "model": {
    "provider": "openai | anthropic | google",
    "model": "gpt-5 | claude-3.5-sonnet",
    "temperature": 0.7,
    "maxTokens": 1000
  },
  "voice": {
    "provider": "elevenlabs | openai",
    "voiceId": "string",
    "stability": 0.5,
    "similarityBoost": 0.8
  },
  "firstMessage": "string",
  "endCallPhrases": ["auf wiedersehen", "tschss"],
  "language": "de-DE | en-US | fr-FR",
  "gdprCompliant": true
}

Response (201)

{
  "id": "asst_1234567890",
  "name": "Customer Support Bot",
  "status": "active",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "gdprCompliant": true,
  "serverLocation": "eu-central-1"
}
GET
/v1/assistants
List all assistants

Query Parameters

limit integer Max 100, default 25
offset integer Pagination offset
status string active | inactive | draft
PATCH
/v1/assistants/{id}
Update assistant
DELETE
/v1/assistants/{id}
Delete assistant

Calls API

Voice calls verwalten und berwachen

POST
/v1/calls
Start new voice call

Request Body

{
  "assistantId": "asst_1234567890",
  "customer": {
    "number": "+49301234567",
    "name": "Max Mustermann",
    "language": "de-DE"
  },
  "metadata": {
    "campaignId": "campaign_123",
    "customField": "value"
  },
  "gdprConsent": true,
  "recordCall": false
}
GET
/v1/calls
List call history
DELETE
/v1/calls/{id}
End active call

Workflows API

Conversation flows und automation

POST
/v1/workflows
Create workflow
GET
/v1/workflows
List workflows
